body_html:
@sleighsoft max_to_keep should now be addressed with 7a81491

Usage example from the docstring:

import tensorflow as tf
checkpoint = tf.train.Checkpoint(optimizer=optimizer, model=model)
manager = tf.contrib.checkpoint.CheckpointManager(
    checkpoint, directory="/tmp/model", max_to_keep=5)
status = checkpoint.restore(manager.latest_checkpoint)
while True:
  # train
  manager.save()

body:
@sleighsoft max_to_keep should now be addressed with https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/7a81491366afb444efb914b93594a11fdfc19896

Usage example from the docstring:
```
import tensorflow as tf
checkpoint = tf.train.Checkpoint(optimizer=optimizer, model=model)
manager = tf.contrib.checkpoint.CheckpointManager(
    checkpoint, directory="/tmp/model", max_to_keep=5)
status = checkpoint.restore(manager.latest_checkpoint)
while True:
  # train
  manager.save()
 ```
